author_name: Hunter Biden doesn't recall knocking up a stripper
html:
What about stopping crime downtown? Isn't that more important than Selfies on social media? OK, who am I kidding - Tecklenburg is a clown ü§°ü§°ü§°for a mayor.

— Hunter Biden doesn't recall knocking up a stripper (@BidenLegs) August 17, 2021
